  • Uses of AbstractInstantBasedTimeValidator in org.hibernate.validator.internal.constraintvalidators.bv.time.future

    Subclasses of AbstractInstantBasedTimeValidator in org.hibernate.validator.internal.constraintvalidators.bv.time.future
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractFutureInstantBasedValidator<T>
    Base class for all @Future validators that use an Instant to be compared to the time reference.
    class 
    FutureValidatorForCalendar
    Check that the java.util.Calendar passed to be validated is in the future.
    class 
    FutureValidatorForDate
    Check that the java.util.Date passed to be validated is in the future.
